about.description:
Sphinx supports markdown via Recommonmark, which does not support
tables. This extension provides them.
about.summary: A Sphinx extension for rendering tables written in markdown

name: sphinx-markdown-tables
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "sphinx-markdown-tables" %}
{% set version = "0.0.12" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: 08779e77832b6562b6b86e4270ae50b0b10010fdd35cf9aadcb5b8246571b933

build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  noarch: python

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
  run:
    - markdown ==3.0.1
    - python >=3.5
    - recommonmark

test:
  imports:
    - sphinx_markdown_tables
  requires:
    - sphinx
  files:
    - test.md

about:
  home: "https://github.com/ryanfox/sphinx-markdown-tables"
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  license_family: GPL3
  # Manually including license file in recipe as upstream does not
  # currently package it.  If/when the following issue is resolved,
  # the file can be removed from the recipe.
  # https://github.com/ryanfox/sphinx-markdown-tables/issues/27
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: "A Sphinx extension for rendering tables written in markdown"
  description: |
    Sphinx supports markdown via Recommonmark, which does not support
    tables. This extension provides them.
  doc_url: https://pypi.org/project/sphinx-markdown-tables/
  dev_url: https://github.com/ryanfox/sphinx-markdown-tables/
  doc_source_url: https://github.com/ryanfox/sphinx-markdown-tables/blob/master/README.md

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - nowster
    - benjamb
